hero.title: Skip the hassle of the ordinary.
hero.subtitle: Jumpstart your product. We build web and mobile apps that scale—so you can focus on your business.

valueProps.heading: One team. End-to-end delivery.
valueProps.subheading: We help startups and enterprises build software with minimal friction and optimal results.
valueProps.timeDesc: Ship faster with proven processes and reusable architecture. We cut through complexity so you hit the market sooner.
valueProps.qualityDesc: Clean, maintainable code and solid testing. We build for the long term so your product stays reliable as it grows.
valueProps.partnershipDesc: Work with a team that understands your goals. Clear communication, transparent timelines, and no surprises.

features.heading: Build with one team, one process
features.subheading: From concept to deployment, we bring your product to life with modern tools and clear communication.
features.ideaTitle: From idea to production, in one place
features.ideaDesc: We handle requirements, design, development, and deployment. Our process turns your brief into a live product—no juggling multiple vendors.
features.stackDesc: React, Next.js, Node, TypeScript, and cloud-native infra. We use tools that scale and stay maintainable so you're not stuck with legacy tech.
features.transparentDesc: Clear milestones, regular demos, and fixed-scope options where it fits. You always know what's built, what's next, and when it ships.
features.supportDesc: Post-launch support, bug fixes, and feature iterations. We stay involved so your product keeps improving without starting from scratch.

services.heading: End-to-end software solutions
services.subheading: We bring together design, development, and delivery so you can ship faster and scale with confidence.
services.webDesc: Full-stack web apps with React, Next.js, and Node. From dashboards to e-commerce, we build fast, scalable products.
services.mobileDesc: Native and cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android. User-focused design and robust backend integration.
services.apiDesc: REST and GraphQL APIs, third-party integrations, and system-to-system connections. Secure and well-documented.
services.consultingDesc: Architecture reviews, tech due diligence, and roadmap planning. Get clarity before you build.
services.mvpDesc: Turn your idea into a working MVP in weeks. Validate with real users and iterate with confidence.
services.maintenanceDesc: Ongoing support, security updates, and feature enhancements. Keep your product healthy and evolving.

solutions.heading: Built for how you work
solutions.subheading: Whether you're a startup, a product team, or an enterprise, we adapt to your context and deliver.
solutions.startupsDesc: From idea to first release. We build MVPs and early products so you can validate and iterate fast.
solutions.teamsDesc: Extend your team with senior engineers. We slot into your process and ship features on your stack.
solutions.enterpriseDesc: Legacy modernization, integrations, and new products. We work with your security and compliance needs.

testimonials.heading: Trusted by product teams
testimonials.subheading: See what founders and technical leads say about working with us.
testimonials.quote1: Zhiyuan delivered our MVP on time and within budget. The codebase is clean and well-documented—we've been able to extend it ourselves.
testimonials.quote2: We needed a partner who could handle both frontend and backend. Zhiyuan understood our domain and shipped a product our users love.
testimonials.quote3: From requirements to deployment, the process was transparent. We're now scaling with the same team for support and new features.

clientLogos.heading: Trusted by product teams and enterprises

cta.heading: Get started with a free consultation
cta.subheading: Tell us about your project. We'll reply within 24 hours with next steps—no commitment required.

footer.tagline: Software development that scales. Web, mobile, APIs, and consulting.
